attributes.action: ensure that ambulances are staffed by two paramedics and not replaced by response vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many NHS trusts are cutting back on the number of paramedics in an ambulance from 2 to 1. This is an obvious danger when a person needs to be taken to hospital but needs constant care. Ambulances are being replaced by fast response vehicles which are less well equipped then an ambulance.
